name: ABC
text:
The owner says no police showed up to stop the looting at his shop, but 15 officers appeared while he was cleaning it up.

 "I was with three black men and 15 police come to us and they're thinking I was trying to vandalize my own store."
 https://t.co/W37m2DN8wJ

name: ABC
text: RT @MarthaRaddatz: Your Lincoln Memorial this evening. https://t.co/QByGgWeDDm

name: ABC
text: 'America in Pain – What Comes Next?' | Our live one-hour special begins at 9/8c on ABC. https://t.co/ApEUb3z93W https://t.co/HZJF45BvQF

name: ABC
text: Coronavirus task force coordinator Dr. Deborah Birx says “I worry terribly about the peaceful protests,” adding that the federal government is working with mayors to expand testing availability so protesters can get tested. https://t.co/5RexmYYj45 https://t.co/3eQCCOBsuf

name: ABC
text: The Congressional Black Caucus is at work on a package of reform bills the House could advance later this month in response to the death of George Floyd, says Rep. Karen Bass, the chair of the caucus. https://t.co/epM0SrwKPC

name: ABC
text: WATCH LIVE: We have continuing coverage of protests from coast to coast following the death of George Floyd in Minnesota. https://t.co/YNmtDjvRmn

name: ABC
text: A doctor contracted by the Dept. of Homeland Security to advise on detention health conditions appeared before Congress on Tuesday to personally criticize the Trump administration as COVID-19 continues to spread through civil immigration detention centers. https://t.co/JdsL0rFRmy

name: ABC
text: RT @ABC2020: "America In Pain" | Tonight, as protests continue across the country following the death of George Floyd, join us for our @ABC News special as we discuss, #WhatComesNext to bring lasting change? https://t.co/gkMVo21Gbz"America In Pain" | Tonight, as protests continue across the country following the death of George Floyd, join us f… https://t.co/HxrRjmAcZ4

text:
.@DavidMuir reports on the thousands of people marching across the country after the death of George Floyd. https://t.co/80RHaCASBt

#WhatComesNext https://t.co/9mC5zl1vzo

name: ABC
text: RT @GMA: .@SteveOsunsami reports on the boiling point in America and talks to experts about how we got here. "There are so many reminders of the pandemic of racism." https://t.co/K0tbPCiqCq #WhatComesNext https://t.co/ETXttHXqgt

name: ABC
text: 27% of adults in a new @ABC News/WaPo poll say they definitely (15%) or probably (12%) would not get vaccinated against the coronavirus. https://t.co/JTdLPlrebf https://t.co/1XCsjczIxs

name: ABC
text: Bishop Mariann Edgar Budde, who oversees St. John Episcopal Church, reacts to Pres. Trump’s visit and says police using force to clear out peaceful protestors is “antithetical to the the teachings of Jesus.” https://t.co/Uqx4I6R7YF https://t.co/A1CIf4JaOB

name: ABC
text:

name: ABC
text:
NEW: In a series of tweets, Pres. Trump announced Tuesday the Republican National Convention will no longer be held in North Carolina.

Earlier in the day, Gov. Roy Cooper denied the RNC's request for a "full convention" due to the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/8mZoEItT3o https://t.co/xBmuoC9Pz3

name: ABC
text: "These fundamental public health measures are going to remain important." https://t.co/1rIr1BuS6q

name: ABC
text: The Insurrection Act has rarely been invoked in its 213 years—but in modern times, presidents have typically assumed the power to deal with the agony of racial conflict, even relying on the provision to uphold federal civil rights in the Deep South. https://t.co/Uy1tpo6FcZ

name: ABC
text: "I'm here for George because I want justice for him," says Roxie Washington, the mother of George Floyd’s daughter. "I want justice for him because he was good." https://t.co/WsdPMgGXzg https://t.co/DC3LIWFsya

name: ABC
text: Industries that are increasing their hiring demand include those in public health, with new jobs like contact tracing emerging. https://t.co/2mwqIz6IDh

name: ABC
text: LGBTQ advocates are calling for a full investigation and accountability into the shooting death of a black trans man by a police officer in Tallahassee last week. https://t.co/Uf54XX9mC6

name: ABC
text: Authorities in Louisville released additional video footage showing what they claim is David McAtee, who was shot dead by law enforcement earlier this week, firing his gun first. https://t.co/m06oXXdy4P

name: ABC
text: Following a week of nationwide unrest, Joe Biden delivered an emotional speech condemning Pres. Trump, and addressing what he describes as a “wake-up call” for a country upended by racial upheaval. https://t.co/JV8ZHcuIQL https://t.co/Bi6bCmI4Lh

name: ABC
text: RT @ABCPolitics: Steve King, a nine-term Iowa congressman who became a GOP outcast after making comments to the New York Times about white supremacy that drew backlash from within his own party, has been defeated by Randy Feenstra, a conservative state senator, AP projects https://t.co/W2RTGQixx6
